text: "Only the Good Die Young" is a 1978 song by Billy Joel. It was taken from his fifth studio album The Stranger. It went to number 18 in Canada and number 24 in the United States. It was controversial track at the time of its release. ==Track listing== ===7" single (1978)=== # "Only the Good Die Young" – (3:55) # "Get It Right the First Time" – (3:32) ==References== Category:1978 songs Category:Billy Joel songs Category:Boogie rock songs Category:Pop rock songs
title: Only the Good Die Young
